segments.text: Welcome . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want to look at some of your products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This way please . We have a full range of products from cosmetics to skin cleansers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you commend me some moisturizers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your T-zone gets oily easily , but your cheeks are dry in winter . Am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This " Cream of Olives " is our bestseller for combination skin . You can try it on your hand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , very good . I will buy this one .
segments.speaker: S2
